description: Companion bot for https://telegram.me/chtwrsbot?start=5643e700a64041fb9adb7ac9e6226039 to calculate Foray Timings
PokemonGo Events announcement channel when the event is about to start (15 minutes before it happens)
Archive of the traffic camera at the borders to check for traffic. Good for looking back at previous traffic conditions to extrapolate future traffic
